title: Drawing, "Cloud Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache on paper, lined.
description: On royal blue background, motif with irregularly-shaped clouds in white and gray with blue hatch marks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cloud Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-7.
